title: Oni’s Blood
description: Teenager Shiki is attacked by a mysterious man and learns of his Oni heritage.

title: If You Want to Make It, Keep On Winning
description: Shiki wakes up confused and meets Naito Mudano, who explains the situation between the Oni and the Momotaro.

title: Blood Eclipse Release
description: The first test begins as the students face the ‘demon catcher’ challenge at the academy.

title: Work With Me
description: If they want to pass the test their teacher has given them, the students must start working together.

title: Bad News
description: The students reach the Kyoto underground and discover new things about the war they’re involved in.

title: Even the Loner Path Has Its Limits
description: Undead attack the students and Shiki is forced to make a decision that changes his mindset.

title: The Beauty Is a Beast
description: Yomogi uses his power to seal off the underground as the students must fight to survive.

title: The Unreliable Hero
description: Kuina fights a battle but finds herself in a very delicate situation.

title: Momotaro Spirit
description: The riots affect the security of the temple and the students must evacuate the people as soon as possible.

title: Kishin’s Child
description: Samidare goes to Momotaro HQ in Tokyo. Despite taunts, he asserts he alone will eliminate Shiki.

title: Thank You!
description: Back at the academy, the students have to divide up to share rooms.

title: Day of the Storm
description: A storm catches the boys by surprise and they have to stay locked up for a night.

title: Mikado, Like the Gate of the Gods
description: Shiki faces the hidden truth about his father’s past.

title: Personal Rule
description: Shiki begins to train for the upcoming battle, but a new enemy approaches.

title: Found You
description: Shiki’s determination to protect his friends is put to the ultimate test.
